actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to establish a special impact job creation program for areas of high youth unemployment.

summary.text: Establishes a program under the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act to fund certain housing, health service-related, and similar projects in areas of high youth-unemployment. Authorizes to carry out the program such sums as are necessary to create 1,000,000 jobs.

titles.title: A bill to establish a special impact job creation program for areas of high youth unemployment.
